column4: when trying to compile pidgin from souce, I get this error You must have the GLib 2.0 development headers installed to build. If you have these installed already you may need to install pkg-config so I can find them.
why compile when it's in the repos?  and apt-get build-dep will get all the dev headers you'll need if you really want to compile
you can get rid of the great majority with apt-get remove libqt3-mt
